name: Just a Song
description:
Game started on ScoreSpace Jam #22. The chosen theme was "falling", also as an extra requirement, the game had to contain a maximum score system with a leaderboard, implemented with the Loot Locker plugin.

The entire core of the game was made in the 72 hours that the Jam lasted, however I was not happy with the visuals, so I decided not to upload it and spend a few more days to experiment with its aesthetics.

-----

In the game you will have to type the lyrics of a song while it plays in the background. Each verse will appear on the screen while it is being sung, type it before the next one begins to be sung. The more you type, the more points you will get.
